meanings.definition: A horny substance found in the mouth of certain whales, used for filtering food from water.
meanings.sent1: The baleen of the whale helps it catch tiny fish for dinner.
meanings.sent2: Whales use their baleen to sift out small shrimp from the ocean water.
meanings.sent3: The baleen thought it was a pasta strainer, but it ended up in the ocean!
meanings.sent4: Her baleen was like a delicate sieve, capturing the tiniest of prey.
meanings.sent5: The baleen acted as a natural filter, allowing only food to pass through.
